title: Pair of Shoes for Bound Feet
description: lined slipper style with pink tuffted ball at toe; silk patterned tape in green, blue and white; inner toes patched in different fabric; batik binding at ankle edge and toe; white cotton stiff stitched sole in pear shape; tied together
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
